definition[0]: if a company or country is swallowed up by a larger one, it becomes part of it and no longer exists on its own
example[0]: Hundreds of small companies have been swallowed up by these huge multinationals.
definition[1]: if something is swallowed up, it disappears because something covers it or hides it
example[1]: Jane was soon swallowed up in the crowd.
example[2]: The countryside is gradually being swallowed up by new developments.
definition[2]: if an amount of money is swallowed up, you have to spend it to pay for things
example[3]: The extra cash was soon swallowed up.
